text:
If you use the new record-timers feature of the HTTP Proxy, and you keep one of
the timers (the generated ones or the original one) selected in the tree while
you record, you'll see its configuration magically change to become the same as
the newly generated one.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text:
Workaround: select the HTTP Proxy itself before starting recording.

--
Downgrading to minor severity, since there's an easy workaround.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
